I am a student just learning C++, so I want to improve my code ability through leetcode
#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import sys,base64
def egcd(a, b):
    if a == 0:
        return (b, 0, 1)
    else:
        g, y, x = egcd(b % a, a)
    return (g, x - (b // a) * y, y)
    
def modinv(a, m):
    g, x, y = egcd(a, m)
    if g != 1:
        raise Exception('modular inverse does not exist')
    else:
        return x % m

def pad_even(x):#重要！凑齐2位，将0x1 变成 0x01
        return ('', '0')[len(x)%2] + x


def CipherB2n(c):#将base64编码后的密文转成数字
    c2 = base64.b64decode(c)
    temp = ''
    for i in c2:
        temp += pad_even(str(hex(ord(i)))[2:])
    temp = eval('0x'+temp)
    return (temp)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    
    sys.setrecursionlimit(1000000)
    e1 = 2333 #根据分解结果
    e2 = 23333 #根据分解结果
    s = egcd(e1, e2)
    s1 = s[1]
    s2 = s[2]
    c1 = 

    c2 

    n =  #共n
    if s1<0:
        s1 = - s1
        c1 = modinv(c1, n)
    elif s2<0:
        s2 = - s2
        c2 = modinv(c2, n)
    m=(pow(c1,s1,n)*pow(c2,s2,n)) % n
    print m
    print CipherN2b(m)
